title: Flutter Developer
description: Build and maintain cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter. Collaborate with backend developers.

title: Senior PHP Laravel Developer
description: Develop and maintain web applications using PHP Laravel framework. Ensure best practices in performance, security, and scalability.

title: UX/UI Designer
description: Design user-centered interfaces and experiences. Create wireframes, prototypes, and collaborate with developers to bring designs to life.

title: Graphic Design Intern
description: Assist the design team with creating social media graphics, UI mockups, and marketing materials. Learn design tools and processes.

title: Software Development Intern
description: Work with senior developers on real-world projects using modern frameworks. Learn coding best practices and version control.

title: Digital Marketing Intern
description: Support the marketing team with social media content, SEO tasks, and campaign analytics. Gain hands-on experience in digital strategy.
